Instance.description: Base class for any rabbit holes that expect multiple sims. As of 1/12/2023, there are some assumptions being made that might need to change: 1. The rabbit hole participant list is static. 2. The rabbit hole participants are always given in the same order. 3. The 'sim' and 'sim_id' fields in rabbit hole can be any of the sims in the rabbit hole. 4. If different affordances are needed for each sim, they all share the same duration.
